correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer in relation to the task's requirements and available data.

reasoning_traceability.description: The clarity and follow-ability of the logical steps taken to reach the conclusion.

completion_time.description: The amount of time taken to complete the task from start to finish.

data_independence.description: The solution's reliance on the data provided without needing external information or resources.

novelty_of_approach.description: The uniqueness or innovativeness of the method used to solve the task.

steps_completion.description: How many of the required steps have been successfully accomplished.

solution_efficiency.description: The efficiency of the process, including the use of resources and avoiding redundant actions.

multi_agent_collaboration.description: The effectiveness of the interaction between different agents involved in the problem-solving process.
